General.Name: Yuhuan CNC Machine Tool Co Ltd
General.Description: Yuhuan CNC Machine Tool Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, sells, and services CNC grinding and intelligent equipment in China and internationally. It offers double faced, single sided, and compound grinders; double and single sided grinding and polishing, surface and CNC, and five-axis CNC polishing machine; and smart equipment, such as intelligent power transmission, logistic conveying system, CNC machine tool automation, robot application, and non-standard customization equipment. The company also provides smart silo and intelligent sampling system, impeller, plate and disc feeders. It serves consumer electronics, automobile, military and aerospace, smart home, LCD, and semiconductor applications. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Changsha, China.
